column1: French: « Leur comportement thermique n’est pas aussi stable que celui des grandes grottes de la planète qui maintiennent une température constante, mais ils se ressemblent en ce qu’ils sont des trous profonds dans la terre », selon Glen Cushing, membre de l’équipage de l'USGS (Centre américain d’études géologiques) et du personnel de l’Université d’Arizona du Nord situé à Flagstaff, en Arizona. = English:
column2: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
column3: Their thermal behavior is not as stable as that of the deep caves on the planet that maintain a constant temperature, but they resemble each other in that they are deep holes in the ground.

column1: French: Chambers avait poursuivi Dieu en justice pour « mise à mort généralisée, destruction et terreur infligées à des millions et des millions d'habitants de la Terre. » = English:

column1: French: Les larges boulevards, les bâtiments vitrés et les centres commerciaux modernes sont parsemés de toits traditionnels en tuiles rouges, du marché du XVIIIe siècle, et de vieilles mosquées et églises, bien que la ville ait une atmosphère qui rappelle plus l'Europe méditerranéenne que la Turquie traditionnelle. = English:
column2: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
column3: The wide boulevards, the glass-fronted buildings and the modern commercial centers are surrounded by traditional red-tiled roofs, the market of the 18th century, and old mosques and churches, although the city has a Mediterranean atmosphere that recalls more the Mediterranean than the Turkish tradition.

column1: French: Des chercheurs de l'université de Princeton aux États-Unis et de l'université d'Uppsala en Suède ont indiqué que la nouvelle espèce avait évolué en seulement deux générations, bien que ce processus ait été estimé beaucoup plus long, suite à la reproduction entre un pinson de Darwin endémique, Geospiza fortis, et le pinson immigrant à bec conique, Geospiza conirostris. = English:
column2: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
column3: Researchers from the University of Princeton in the United States and the University of Uppsala in Sweden have indicated that the new species had evolved in only two generations, although this process had been estimated to be much longer, following reproduction between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortis, and the finch with a beak conical, Geospiza conirostris.

column1: French: L'Indonésie comptant 17 000 îles, la cuisine indonésienne est un terme générique qui couvre une grande variété de cuisines régionales présentes dans tout le pays. = English:

column1: French: Les langues officielles de Barcelone sont le catalan et l'espagnol. Environ la moitié des habitants préfère parler catalan, une grande majorité le comprend, et pratiquement tout le monde est capable de parler espagnol. = English:

column1: French: La plupart des interprétations du déterminisme technologique s’accordent sur deux idées générales : le développement technologique lui-même se déroule selon un processus dépassant largement les influences culturelles et politiques, et la technologie a une incidence sur les sociétés conditionnées intrinsèquement plutôt que socialement. = English:
column2: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
column3: Most interpretations of technological determinism agree on two general ideas: technological development itself occurs according to a process that goes beyond cultural and political influences, and technology has an intrinsic influence on societies rather than being socially conditioned.

column2: Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships.
column3: Great Britain is mining international waters in order to prevent ships from sailing in entire maritime zones, representing a threat even to neutral ships.

column1: French: Les plantes revêtent leur plus belle apparence lorsqu'elles se trouvent dans un environnement naturel, alors résistez à la tentation d'en retirer ne serait-ce qu'« une seule ». = English:
column2: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
column3: The plants look their best when they are in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "one".

column1: French: Entre 22 h 00 et 23 h 00 MDT, les détenus ont allumé un feu dans la cour. = English:
column2: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
column3: Between 22:00 and 23:00 MDT, the inmates lit a fire in the yard.

column1: French: L'« équipe invisible » est l'équipe de direction à laquelle chacun des membres rend ses comptes. Elle établit les standards pour chaque d'eux. = English:
column2: The “invisible team” is the management team to which each of the members report. The invisible team sets the standards for each member.
column3: The invisible team is the team of direction to which each member reports. It establishes the standards for each of them.

column1: French: La peur du manque de transport a engendré la possibilité que le match puisse se jouer à huis clos, sans les supporters des équipes. = English:
column2: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
column3: The fear of a lack of transport has led to the possibility that the match can be played behind closed doors, without the supporters of the teams.

column1: French: Chaque temple avait une cour ouverte, puis un sanctuaire intérieur auquel seuls les prêtres pouvaient accéder. = English:
column2: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
column3: Each temple had an open court, then an inner sanctuary to which only priests could enter.

column1: French: Le centre de la méditation tibétaine est le yoga de la déité. C'est grâce à la visualisation de différentes déités que les canaux d'énergie sont nettoyés, les chakras activés, et la conscience d'éveil créée. = English:
column2: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
column3: The Tibetan meditation center is the yoga of the gods. It is through the visualization of different deities that the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras activated, and the awakening consciousness created.

column1: French: Il n'y a pas vraiment de saisons « pluvieuses » et « sèches » : les précipitations sont à peu près constantes tout au long de l'année. = English:
column2: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
column3: There are not really any wet and dry seasons: the precipitation is pretty much constant throughout the year.

column1: French: Après sept jours de défaites électorales aux élections de mi-mandat, Bush a fait part de son projet d'élargir le commerce en Asie. = English:
column2: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
column3: After seven days of electoral defeats, Bush announced his plan to expand trade in Asia.

column1: French: Malheureusement, l'apparition de nouveaux modes de rédaction a relégué le stylo à un statut plus confidentiel et à des utilisations plus rares. = English:
column2: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
column3: Unfortunately, the appearance of new modes of writing has relegated the pencil to a more private and less frequent use.

column1: French: Les opinions d'Aristote sur toutes les questions scientifiques, y compris la psychologie, ont été acceptées. = English:
column2: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
column3: Aristotle's opinions on all scientific questions, including psychology, have been accepted.

column1: French: Les théories du contenu sont centrées sur la recherche de ce qui fait que les gens se sentent bien ou qu'ils sont attirés. = English:
column2: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
column3: The theories of content are centered on the search for what makes people feel good or attracted.

column1: French: Nous fabriquons nos maisons et nos vêtements à base de plantes. La plupart des aliments que nous mangeons sont des plantes. Sans les plantes, les animaux ne survivraient pas. = English:
column2: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
column3: We make our houses and our clothes from plants. Most of the food that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals would not survive.

column1: French: Le dernier match du championnat aura lieu à l’Ellis Park de Johannesburg la semaine prochaine, lorsque les Springboks affronteront l’Australie. = English:
column2: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
column3: The last match of the championship will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks will face Australia.

column1: French: L'une des méthodes les plus courantes utilisées pour illustrer l'importance de la socialisation est de s'inspirer des quelques cas malheureux d'enfants qui, par négligence, malheur ou abus volontaire, n'ont pas été socialisés par des adultes pendant leur enfance. = English:
column2: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
column3: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to use the few unfortunate cases of children who, through negligence, misfortune or abuse, were not socialized by adults during their childhood.

column1: French: L’argent pourrait être reversé dans la construction de maisons résistantes aux inondations, dans une meilleure gestion de l’eau et dans la diversification des cultures. = English:
column2: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
column3: The money could be used to build houses that are resistant to flooding, to better manage water and to diversify agriculture.

column1: French: L'argent peut être échangé à la seule banque des îles située à Stanley, en face du magasin FIC West. = English:
column2: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.
column3: Money can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands located at Stanley, in front of the store FIC West.

column1: French: Ne défigurez pas le site en marquant ou en grattant des graffitis sur les structures. = English:
column2: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
column3: Do not deface the site by drawing or scratching graffiti on the structures.
